title: I CAN LOGIN INTO LOL WHY!
body: the game keep giving me this "Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server." like after loging in.. it give me that massege any one got same problem or it's just me and btw this happend after the ranked game was shutdown. (help)

replies.body: Are you still having an issue?  Any downtime or maintenance will be posted on the[ service status ](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune)page.  Let me know, and I'd be happy to help!
it have been 3 damn hours and still no answer expect for we are working on it........................................
like check this link it's the web page (http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune) and look what it said they should change it if it not working...

like it keep giving me this too "Service availability can be viewed on the League of Legends Server Status web page." i go and check there web page and it's said the server is online... just answer me is it just me so i can know the problem is from me or them i just want to make sure.
